userDashboard.promo: Your partner in protecting rice crops. Ready to detect diseases and get recommendations?
userDashboard.uploadImageDesc: Upload an image of a rice leaf to detect diseases.
userDashboard.detectionHistoryDesc: View your past disease detection results and recommendations.
userDashboard.diseaseLibraryDesc: Browse the library of known rice diseases and their treatments.
userDashboard.modernSolutionsDesc: PadiGuard is here to help rice farmers manage their crops more intelligently and efficiently. With advanced AI technology, we provide accurate disease detection, in-depth information, and practical recommendations to increase your harvest.
userDashboard.featureDetectionDesc: Upload an image of your rice leaf and get an instant, highly accurate disease diagnosis.
userDashboard.featureHistoryDesc: Review all your detection history, monitor progress, and access previous recommendations.
userDashboard.featureLibraryDesc: Access a comprehensive database of rice diseases, symptoms, prevention, and treatment solutions.
userDashboard.featureProfileDesc: Manage your account information, update personal details, and change your password easily.
userDashboard.empoweringFarmersDesc: Discover how our advanced AI-powered system helps you identify rice leaf diseases quickly and accurately, providing timely insights for better crop management and higher yields. Join our community of successful farmers today!

agriculturalResources.pageDescription: Comprehensive information on medicines, fertilizers, and pesticides for healthy cultivation.
agriculturalResources.medicineSectionContent1: Explore a comprehensive list of common diseases, their symptoms, and effective medicinal treatments. Learn about fungicides, bactericides, and other chemical or organic solutions to protect your crops.
agriculturalResources.medicineSectionContent2: Understand the proper application methods, dosage, and safety precautions when using medicines. Ensure environmental protection and food safety by following recommended guidelines.
agriculturalResources.fertilizerSectionContent1: Discover various types of fertilizers, including organic and inorganic options, suitable for different growth stages. Learn about NPK ratios, micronutrients, and their impact on plant health.
agriculturalResources.fertilizerSectionContent2: Master the best practices for applying fertilizers to maximize absorption and minimize waste. Understand timing, methods (broadcasting, deep placement), and environmental considerations.
agriculturalResources.pesticideSectionContent1: Identify common pests such as stem borers, leaf folders, and planthoppers. Learn about integrated pest management (IPM) strategies and effective pesticide solutions to protect your harvest.
agriculturalResources.pesticideSectionContent2: Understand the safe handling, storage, and application of pesticides. Explore organic and biological pest control alternatives to reduce chemical reliance and promote sustainable farming.
